long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This web app enables to receive Israel Post status change notifications. 

Simply add your tracking number (e.g. EE123456789IL) and enter your email address. You should get an email notification once the status is changed. No need to leave the browser open or even the computer open - it's all happening in the cloud
